conclusion: Block a is initially at rest at point A. Block b is initially at a height h. The string remains taut. Block a collides with block b at the lowest point of the conveyor belt.

The velocity of block a immediately after the collision is the same as the velocity of block b before the collision, which is 0.75 m/s.
